definition: to introduce (sb)/(esp.) to present to the emperor
to lead by the hand/to guide/to support
to pull strings/to manipulate (a puppet)/to control from behind the scene/to mediate
to get to know sb/to meet sb for the first time
to appreciate/to recognize the worth of sth/appreciation
pay an official call/call on/visit in an official capacity
to be well acquainted with/to know well
to pay a visit/to call on
Mao Sui recommends himself (idiom); to offer one's services (in the style of Mao Sui offering his services to king of Chu 楚 of the Warring states)
to intercede/to plead for sb else
to promote to a higher job/to select for promotion
